Posts.Content: Sep 1, 2014 08:02AM karla2sassy2 wrote: Yes!     I finished my chemo about a year ago and suffered substantial but not complete eyelash and brow loss.   After a few months they returned to as good as ever!    Within the last 3 weeks have lost all the long lashes totally top and bottom and now missing a lot of brow, only now infant teeny lashes starting regrowth hopefully.     Crazy.  No other explanation...:-(
Posts.Title: LOSING EYELASHES LONG AFTER CHEMO heidiw karla2sassy2
